name: Anti-Designator Mag Projector, Alternate (AltaDMPj-15)
description: Alternate version of the anti-designator mag projector. The weapon senses the effects of a mag designator and can be set to automatically fire or wait for a manual command to fire.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
